attributes.action: Introduce Mandatory Drug Testing of all Members of Parliament, the Scottish Executive and Welsh Assembly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All Members of Parliament, the Scottish Executive, and the Welsh Assembly should be tested for proscribed substances, such as Cannabis and Heroin, at regular fortnightly or monthly intervals regardless of whether the House is sitting.

Testing may be by way of oral swabs or urine/blood samples, at the discretion of the Prime Minister.

Testing should be mandatory, with no option to abstain, and the results should be made public on the government's Parliament website and elsewhere.

Any member refusing to provide a sample or take part in these tests should be suspended from the Chamber.

The penalty for testing positive is to be left at the discretion of the Prime Minister.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
